synopsis.text: Daemonium particles, a result of a catastrophic nuclear explosion, have transformed the Earth into a post-apocalyptic landscape teeming with demons. In this chaotic world, a compassionate elementary student named Kento discovers a small daemon creature, whom he affectionately names Anna. After a tragic encounter with a bounty hunter leaves Kento's mother dead, the duo embarks on a thrilling quest to resurrect her. Together, they traverse the ruins of Japan, evading sinister forces that threaten their mission and forging an unbreakable bond along the way. Join Kento and Anna as they navigate the challenges of a world collided with Hell, driven by love and hope in the face of adversity.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
